# PLAYER::GET_PLAYER_PED_SCRIPT_INDEX

## Summary
Converts the player index, to the script id used in the decorator functions

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player

## Returns
* **PLAYER_SCRIPT_ID**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Does the same like PLAYER::GET_PLAYER_PED
